thread.title: British companies outed in gender pay gap report

title: British companies outed in gender pay gap report
text:
British companies outed in gender pay gap report Thursday, April 05, 2018 - 01:44 
HSBC, Europe's largest bank, has reported the largest difference in male and female staff salaries among large organisations in Britain, as the government looks to pressure big companies in financial services and other sectors to reduce gender pay disparities. Rosanna Philpott reports.
